mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, t1.sea_id, t1.name, t1.phone, t1.source, t1.leads_status, t2.follower_name as preFollowerName FROM we_leads t1 left join we_leads_follower t2 on t1.id = t2.leads_id and is_latest = 1 WHERE t1.sea_id = #{seaId} and t1.del_flag = 0 AND t1.name like concat('%',#{name},'%') AND t1.phone like concat('%',#{phone},'%') AND t1.leads_status = #{leadsStatus} ORDER BY create_time DESC
